  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors 
    Constructor Description
    SocketClientConnectionStub​(java.net.Socket socket, Server server)
    Constructor of the class: it instantiates an input/output stream from the socket received as parameters, and add the main server to his attributes too.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void close()
    Close the connection with the client, terminating firstly input and output streams, and then invoking the server method called "unregisterClient", which will remove the active virtual client from the list.
